trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 속성 표 내에서 다른 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> 모드 사이를 전환할 수 있도록 하는 단추를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> class.

Determines what type of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode" /> to display upon receipt of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> event.

Checks whether the <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty" /> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> and if that is <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, sets up the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty" />가 소유하는 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />를 변경했는지(또는 이를 얻었거나 손실했는지) 확인하고 <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />일 경우 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />를 전환할 모드로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, means that the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> will be calculated automatically to match the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 값을 가져옵니다. 이는 <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />인 경우 소유하는 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />의 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" />와 일치하도록 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />가 자동으로 계산됨을 의미합니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> 속성을 바탕으로 모드가 전환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" />이 해당 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />의 편집 모드로 자동으로 전환되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, means that the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> will be calculated automatically to match the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 등록합니다. 이는 이 속성이 <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />인 경우 소유하는 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />의 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" />와 일치하도록 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />가 자동으로 계산됨을 의미합니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> 속성을 바탕으로 모드가 전환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> is clicked.
Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" />을 클릭하면 대상 모드를 가져오거나 설정하는 종속성 속성을 등록합니다.
